If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Max Azria worked as a designer in his native Paris for 11 years before coming to the US, laying a fine foundation for the future success of BCBGMAXAZRIA. With the French adage “Bon chic, bon genre” (“Good style, good attitude”) behind its name, BCBGMAXAZRIA clothing evokes both European sophistication and American spirit.
